Layers¶

turret.layers.average_pooling_2d¶

turret.layers.average_pooling_2d.average_pooling_2d(input, window_size, stride=1, padding=0)¶

Layer for average 2D pooling.

Parameters

  • input (turret.Tensor) – Tensor which will be processed by pooling.

  • window_size (tupple) – Window size for pooling.

  • stride (int) – Stride for pooling.

  • padding – Padding for pooling.

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – Tensor processed by pooling.

turret.layers.batch_normalization¶

turret.layers.batch_normalization.batch_normalization(input, mean, variance, gamma=None, beta=None, eps=2e-05)¶

Layer for batch normalization.

Parameters

  • input (turret.Tensor) – Tensor which will be processed by batch normalization.

  • mean (turret.Tensor) – The initial mean value.

  • variance (turret.Tensor) – The initial variance value.

  • gamma (turret.Tensor) – The initial gamma value.

  • beta (turret.Tensor) – The initial beta value.

  • eps (float) – Small float added to variance to avoid dividing by zero.

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – Tensor processed by batch normalization.

turret.layers.bias¶

turret.layers.bias.bias(input, b)¶

Layer to bias.

Parameters

  • input (turret.Tensor) – Tensor which will be biased.

  • b (np.ndarray) – Bias.

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – Biased tensor.

turret.layers.builtin¶

class turret.layers.builtin.ActivationType¶

Bases: object

enumerates the types of activation to perform in an activation layer.

RELU¶

Rectified linear activation.

Type

turret.ActivationType

SIGMOID¶

Sigmoid activation.

Type

turret.ActivationType

TANH¶

TanH activation.

Type

turret.ActivationType

RELU = <ActivationType.RELU: 0>
SIGMOID = <ActivationType.SIGMOID: 1>
TANH = <ActivationType.TANH: 2>
class turret.layers.builtin.ElementWiseOperation¶

Bases: object

Enumerates the binary operations that may be performed by an elementwise layer.

SUM¶

Sum of the two elements.

Type

turret.ElementWiseOperation

PROD¶

Product of the two elements.

Type

turret.ElementWiseOperation

MAX¶

Maximum of the two elements.

Type

turret.ElementWiseOperation

MIN¶

Minimum of the two elements.

Type

turret.ElementWiseOperation

SUB¶

Substract the second element from the first.

Type

turret.ElementWiseOperation

DIV¶

Divide the first element by the second.

Type

turret.ElementWiseOperation

POW¶

The first element to the power of the second element.

Type

turret.ElementWiseOperation

DIV = <ElementWiseOperation.DIV: 5>
MAX = <ElementWiseOperation.MAX: 2>
MIN = <ElementWiseOperation.MIN: 3>
POW = <ElementWiseOperation.POW: 6>
PROD = <ElementWiseOperation.PROD: 1>
SUB = <ElementWiseOperation.SUB: 4>
SUM = <ElementWiseOperation.SUM: 0>
class turret.layers.builtin.PoolingType¶

Bases: object

Type of pooling to perform in a pooling layer.

MAX¶

Maximum over elements.

Type

turret.PoolingType

AVERAGE¶

Average over elements. If the tensor is padded, the count includes the padding.

Type

turret.PoolingType

MAX_AVERAGE_BLEND¶

Blending between the max pooling and average pooling: (1-blendFactor)*maxPool + blendFactor*avgPool

Type

turret.PoolingType

AVERAGE = <PoolingType.AVERAGE: 1>
MAX = <PoolingType.MAX: 0>
MAX_AVERAGE_BLEND = <PoolingType.MAX_AVERAGE_BLEND: 2>
class turret.layers.builtin.RNNDirection¶

Bases: object

Enumerates the RNN directions.

UNIDIRECTION¶

Network iterations from first input to last input.

Type

turret.RNNDirection

BIDIRECTION¶

Network iterates from first to last and vice versa and outputs concatenated.

Type

turret.RNNDirection

BIDIRECTION = <RNNDirection.BIDIRECTION: 1>
UNIDIRECTION = <RNNDirection.UNIDIRECTION: 0>
class turret.layers.builtin.RNNGateType¶

Bases: object

Identifies an individual gate within an RNN cell.

INPUT¶

Input gate (i).

Type

turret.RNNGateType

OUTPUT¶

Output gate (o).

Type

turret.RNNGateType

FORGET¶

Forget gate (f).

Type

turret.RNNGateType

UPDATE¶

Update gate (u).

Type

turret.RNNGateType

RESET¶

Reset gate (r).

Type

turret.RNNGateType

CELL¶

Cell gate (c).

Type

turret.RNNGateType

INPUT

Hidden gate (h).

Type

turret.RNNGateType

CELL = <RNNGateType.CELL: 5>
FORGET = <RNNGateType.FORGET: 2>
HIDDEN = <RNNGateType.HIDDEN: 6>¶
INPUT = <RNNGateType.INPUT: 0>
OUTPUT = <RNNGateType.OUTPUT: 1>
RESET = <RNNGateType.RESET: 4>
UPDATE = <RNNGateType.UPDATE: 3>
class turret.layers.builtin.RNNInputMode¶

Bases: object

Enumerates the RNN input modes.

LINEAR¶

Perform the normal matrix multiplication in the first recurrent layer.

Type

turret.RNNInputMode

SKIP¶

No operation is performed on the first recurrent layer.

Type

turret.RNNInputMode

LINEAR = <RNNInputMode.LINEAR: 0>
SKIP = <RNNInputMode.SKIP: 1>
class turret.layers.builtin.RNNOperation¶

Bases: object

Enumerates the RNN operations.

RELU¶

Single gate RNN with ReLU activation function.

Type

turret.RNNOperation

TANH¶

Single gate RNN with TANH activation function.

Type

turret.RNNOperation

LSTM¶

Four-gate LSTM network without peephole connections.

Type

turret.RNNOperation

GRU¶

Three-gate network consisting of Gated Recurrent Units.

Type

turret.RNNOperation

GRU = <RNNOperation.GRU: 3>
LSTM = <RNNOperation.LSTM: 2>
RELU = <RNNOperation.RELU: 0>
TANH = <RNNOperation.TANH: 1>

class turret.layers.builtin.ScaleMode¶

Bases: object

Controls how scale is applied in a Scale layer.

UNIFORM¶

Identical coefficients across all elements of the tensor.

Type

turret.ScaleMode

CHANNEL¶

Per-channel coefficients.

Type

turret.ScaleMode

ELEMENTWISE¶

Elementwise coefficients.

Type

turret.ScaleMode

CHANNEL = <ScaleMode.CHANNEL: 1>
ELEMENTWISE = <ScaleMode.ELEMENTWISE: 2>
UNIFORM = <ScaleMode.UNIFORM: 0>

turret.layers.builtin.builtin_activation()¶

Layer for activation.

Parameters

  • input (turret.Tensor) – Tensor which will be processed by activation.

  • type (turret.ActivationType) – Type of Activation.

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – Tensor processed by activation.

turret.layers.builtin.builtin_pooling()¶

Layer for pooling.

Parameters

  • input (turret.Tensor) – Tensor which will be processed by pooling.

  • type (turret.PoolingType) – Type of pooling.

  • window_size (tupple) – Window size for pooling.

  • stride (int) – Stride for pooling.

  • padding – Padding for pooling.

  • blend (float, optional) – Blending factor for the max_average_blend mode: max_average_blendPool = (1-blendFactor)*maxPool + blendFactor*avgPool blendFactor is a user value in [0,1] with the default value of 0.0 This value only applies for the MAX_AVERAGE_BLEND mode. Default to None.

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – Tensor processed by pooling.

turret.layers.builtin.concat()¶

Layer for concatenation.

Parameters

  • tensors (object) – Tensors which will be processed by concat layer.

  • axes (int, optional) – Axes to apply layer. Default to 0.

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – Tensor processed by concat layer.

turret.layers.builtin.convolution_2d()¶

Layer for 2D Convolution.

Parameters

  • input (turret.Tensor) – Tensor which will be processed by layer.

  • filters (np.ndarray) – Filters for convolution.

  • biases (np.ndarray, optional) – Biases for convolution. Defaults to None.

  • stride (int, optional) – Stride for convolution. Defaults to 1.

  • padding (int, optional) – Padding for convolution. Defaults to 0.

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – Tensor processed by layer.

turret.layers.builtin.deconvolution_2d()¶

Layer for 2D Deconvolution.

Parameters

  • input (turret.Tensor) – Tensor which will be processed by layer.

  • filters (np.ndarray) – Filters for deconvolution.

  • biases (np.ndarray, optional) – Biases for deconvolution. Default to None.

  • stride (int, optional) – Stride for deconvolution. Default to 1.

  • padding (int, optional) – Padding for deconvolution. Default to 0.

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – Tensor processed by layer.

turret.layers.builtin.elementwise()¶

Layer for elementwise.

Parameters

  • input0 (turret.Tensor) – First tensor which will be processed by layer.

  • input1 (turret.Tensor) – Second tensor which will be processed by layer.

  • op (turret.ElementWiseOperation) – Elementwise operator.

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – Tensor processed by layer.

turret.layers.builtin.fully_connected()¶

Layer for fully connected.

Parameters

  • input (turret.Tensor) – Tensor which will be processed by layer.

  • weights (np.ndarray) – Filters for fully connected layer.

  • biases (np.ndarray, optional) – Biases for fully connected layer. Defaults to None.

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – Tensor processed by layer.

turret.layers.builtin.gather()¶

Layer for gathering.

Parameters

  • data (turret.Tensor) – The tensor to gather values from.

  • indices (turret.Tensor) – The tensor to get indices from to populate the output tensor.

  • axis (int) – The non-batch dimension axis in the data tensor to gather on.

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – Tensor processed by layer.

turret.layers.builtin.local_response_normalization()¶

Layer for local responce normalization(LRN).

Parameters

  • input (turret.Tensor) – Tensor which will be processed by LRN layer.

  • n (int, optional) – Window size. Default to 5.

  • k (float, optional) – LRN K value. Default to 2.0.

  • alpha (float, optional) – LRN alpha value. Default to 1e-4.

  • beta (float, optional) – LRN beta value. Default to 0.75.

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – Tensor processed by LRN layer.

turret.layers.builtin.matrix_multiply()¶

Layer for matrix multiply.

Parameters

  • input0 (turret.Tensor) – The tensor which will be first processed by layer.

  • transpose0 (bool) – True if you transpose input0.

  • input1 (turret.Tensor) – The tensor which will be second processed by layer.

  • transpose1 (bool) – True if you transpose input1.

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – Tensor processed by layer.

turret.layers.builtin.padding()¶

Layer for padding.

Parameters

  • input (turret.Tensor) – The tensor which will be processed by layer.

  • pre (float) – The padding that is applied at the start of the tensor.

  • post (float) – The padding that is applied at the end of the tensor.

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – Tensor processed by layer.

turret.layers.builtin.plugin()¶

Plugin layer.

Parameters

  • tensors (turret.Tensor) – Tensors which will be processed by plugin.

  • instance (turret.PluginBase) – Plugin layer.

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – Tensor processed by plugin.

turret.layers.builtin.ragged_softmax()¶

Layer for ragged softmax.

Parameters

  • input (turret.Tensor) – The ZxS input tensor.

  • bounds (turret.Tensor) – The Zx1 bounds tensor.

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – Tensor processed by layer.

turret.layers.builtin.reduce()¶

Layer for unary operation.

Parameters

  • input (turret.Tensor) – The tensor to be done reduce operation.

  • op (turret.ReduceOperation) – Reduce operation.

  • axes (int) – Axes to apply layer.

  • keepdims (bool, optional) – True if keep dimensions of tensor. Default to False.

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – Operated tensor.

turret.layers.builtin.rnn()¶

Layer for RNN.

Note

This function is not recommended. Use rnn_v2.

Parameters

  • input (turret.Tensor) – Tensor which will be processed by layer.

  • num_layers (int) – The number of layers in the RNN.

  • hidden_size (int) – The size of the internal hidden state for each layer.

  • max_sequence_length (int) – The maximum length of the time sequence.

  • op (turret.RNNOperation) – RNN operator.

  • mode (turret.RNNInputMode) – RNN input mode.

  • direction (turret.RNNDirection) – Direction of RNN.

  • weights (turret.Weights) – Weights.

  • bias (turret.Weights) – Bias.

  • hidden_state (turret.Tensor) – Initial hidden status of RNN.

  • cell_state (turret.Tensor, optional) – Initial cell state of RNN. Default to None.

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – Tensor processed by layer.

turret.layers.builtin.rnn_v2()¶

Layer for RNN.

Parameters

  • input (turret.Tensor) – Tensor which will be processed by layer.

  • num_layers (int) – The number of layers in the RNN.

  • hidden_size (int) – The size of the internal hidden state for each layer.

  • max_sequence_length (int) – The maximum length of the time sequence.

  • op (turret.RNNOperation) – RNN operator.

  • mode (turret.RNNInputMode) – RNN input mode.

  • direction (turret.RNNDirection) – Direction of RNN.

  • weights (turret.Weights) – Weights.

  • bias (turret.Weights) – Bias.

  • hidden_state (turret.Tensor) – Initial hidden status of RNN.

  • cell_state (turret.Tensor, optional) – Initial cell state of RNN. Default to None.

  • sequence_lengths (turret.Tensor, optional) – The sequence lengths specified for the RNN.

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – Tensor processed by layer.

turret.layers.builtin.scale()¶

Layer for scale.

Parameters

  • input (turret.Tensor) – Tensor which will be processed by scale layer.

  • mode (turret.ScaleMode) – The scaling mode.

  • shift (np.ndarray, optional) – The shift value. Default to None.

  • scale (np.ndarray, optional) – The scale value. Default to None.

  • power (np.ndarray, optional) – The power value. Default to None.

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – Tensor processed by scale layer.

turret.layers.builtin.shuffle_and_reshape()¶

Layer to shuffle and reshape.

Parameters

  • input (turret.Tensor) – The tensor which will be processed by layer.

  • order1 (tuple) – The permutation applied by the first transpose operation.

  • shape (turret.Dimensions) – Reshaped dimensions.

  • order2 (tuple) – The permutation applied by the second transpose operation.

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – Tensor processed by layer.

turret.layers.builtin.softmax()¶

Layer for softmax.

Parameters

  • input (turret.Tensor) – Tensor which will be processed by softmax layer.

  • axes (int, optional) – Axes to apply layer. Default to 0.

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – Tensor processed by softmax layer.

turret.layers.builtin.top_k()¶

Layer for TopK reduction.

Parameters

  • input (turret.Tensor) – The tensor which will be processed by layer.

  • op (turret.TopKOperation) – The TopK operation.

  • k (int) – The k value.

  • reduce_axes (int) – Axes to reduce for the layer.

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – The two tensors. The first is the value, and the second is the indices.

Layer for unary operation.

  • op (turret.UnaryOperation) – Unary operation.

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – Operated tensor.

turret.layers.lstm¶

class turret.layers.lstm.LSTMParameterSet(W_input=None, U_input=None, W_cell=None, U_cell=None, W_forget=None, U_forget=None, W_output=None, U_output=None)¶

Bases: object

The object for parameters(weights, bias) of LSTM layer.

Attribute:

W_input(np.ndarray): The initial input parameter for data. U_input(np.ndarray): The initial input parameter for hidden. W_cell(np.ndarray): The initial cell parameter for data. U_cell(np.ndarray): The initial cell parameter for hidden. W_forget(np.ndarray): The initial forget parameter for data. U_forget(np.ndarray): The initial forget parameter for hidden. W_output(np.ndarray): The initial output parameter for data. U_output(np.ndarray): The initial output parameter for hidden.

turret.layers.lstm.blstm(input, max_seq_len, fwd_weights, bwd_weights, fwd_bias, bwd_bias, mode=<RNNInputMode.LINEAR: 0>, hidden_state=None, cell_state=None)¶

Layer for BiLSTM.

Note

This function is not recommended. Use blstm_v2.

Parameters

  • input (turret.Tensor) – Tensor which will be processed by layer.

  • max_seq_len (int) – The maximum length of the time sequence.

  • fwd_weights (turret.Weights) – Forward weights.

  • bwd_weights (turret.Weights) – Backward weights.

  • fwd_bias (turret.Weights) – Forward Bias.

  • bwd_bias (turret.Weights) – Backward Bias.

  • mode (turret.RNNInputMode) – RNN input mode.

  • hidden_state (turret.Tensor) – Initial hidden status of BiLSTM.

  • cell_state (turret.Tensor) – Initial cell state of BiLSTM.

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – Tensor processed by layer.

turret.layers.lstm.lstm(input, max_seq_len, weights, bias, mode=<RNNInputMode.LINEAR: 0>, hidden_state=None, cell_state=None)¶

Layer for LSTM.

Note

This function is not recommended. Use lstm_v2.

Parameters

  • input (turret.Tensor) – Tensor which will be processed by layer.

  • max_seq_len (int) – The maximum length of the time sequence.

  • weights (turret.Weights) – Weights.

  • bias (turret.Weights) – Bias.

  • mode (turret.RNNInputMode) – RNN input mode.

  • hidden_state (turret.Tensor) – Initial hidden status of LSTM.

  • cell_state (turret.Tensor) – Initial cell state of LSTM.

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – Tensor processed by layer.

turret.layers.lstm_v2¶

turret.layers.lstm_v2.blstm_v2(input, max_seq_len, fwd_weights, bwd_weights, fwd_bias, bwd_bias, mode=<RNNInputMode.LINEAR: 0>, hidden_state=None, cell_state=None, sequence_lengths=None)¶

Layer for BiLSTM.

Parameters

  • input (turret.Tensor) – Tensor which will be processed by layer.

  • max_seq_len (int) – The maximum length of the time sequence.

  • fwd_weights (turret.Weights) – Forward weights.

  • bwd_weights (turret.Weights) – Backward weights.

  • fwd_bias (turret.Weights) – Forward Bias.

  • bwd_bias (turret.Weights) – Backward Bias.

  • mode (turret.RNNInputMode) – RNN input mode.

  • hidden_state (turret.Tensor) – Initial hidden status of BiLSTM.

  • cell_state (turret.Tensor) – Initial cell state of BiLSTM.

  • sequence_lengths (turret.Tensor) – The sequence lengths specified for the BiLSTM.

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – Tensor processed by layer.

turret.layers.lstm_v2.lstm_v2(input, max_seq_len, weights, bias, mode=<RNNInputMode.LINEAR: 0>, hidden_state=None, cell_state=None, sequence_lengths=None)¶

Layer for LSTM.

Parameters

  • input (turret.Tensor) – Tensor which will be processed by layer.

  • max_seq_len (int) – The maximum length of the time sequence.

  • weights (turret.Weights) – Weights.

  • bias (turret.Weights) – Bias.

  • mode (turret.RNNInputMode) – RNN input mode.

  • hidden_state (turret.Tensor) – Initial hidden status of LSTM.

  • cell_state (turret.Tensor) – Initial cell state of LSTM.

  • sequence_lengths (turret.Tensor) – The sequence lengths specified for the LSTM.

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – Tensor processed by layer.

turret.layers.max_average_blend_pooling_2d¶

turret.layers.max_average_blend_pooling_2d.max_average_blend_pooling_2d(input, window_size, stride=1, padding=0, blend=0.0)¶

Layer for 2D pooling(max average blend mode).

Parameters

  • input (turret.Tensor) – Tensor which will be processed by pooling.

  • window_size (tupple) – Window size for pooling.

  • stride (int) – Stride for pooling.

  • padding – Padding for pooling.

  • blend (float) – Blending factor for the max_average_blend mode: max_average_blendPool = (1-blendFactor)*maxPool + blendFactor*avgPool blendFactor is a user value in [0,1] with the default value of 0.0

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – Tensor processed by pooling.

turret.layers.max_pooling_2d¶

turret.layers.max_pooling_2d.max_pooling_2d(input, window_size, stride=1, padding=0)¶

Layer for 2D pooling(max mode).

  • input (turret.Tensor) – Tensor which will be processed by pooling.

  • window_size (tupple) – Window size for pooling.

  • stride (int) – Stride for pooling.

  • padding – Padding for pooling.

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – Tensor processed by pooling.

turret.layers.rnn¶

class turret.layers.rnn.GRUParameterSet¶

Bases: object

The object for parameters(weights, bias) of GRU layer.

Attribute:

W_update(np.ndarray): The initial input parameter for data. U_update(np.ndarray): The initial input parameter for hidden. W_reset(np.ndarray): The initial reset parameter for data. U_reset(np.ndarray): The initial reset parameter for hidden. W_hidden(np.ndarray): The initial hidden parameter for data. U_hidden(np.ndarray): The initial hidden parameter for hidden.

class turret.layers.rnn.RNNParameterSet(W_input=None, U_input=None)¶

Bases: object

The object for parameters(weights, bias) of RNN layer.

Attribute:

W_input(np.ndarray): The initial input parameter for data. U_input(np.ndarray): The initial input parameter for hidden.

  • b (np.ndarray) – The bias.

turret.layers.rnn.brnn_relu(input, max_seq_len, fwd_weights, bwd_weights, fwd_bias, bwd_bias, mode=<RNNInputMode.LINEAR: 0>, hidden_state=None)¶

Layer for BiRNN with ReLU.

Note

This function is not recommended. Use brnn_relu_v2.

Parameters

  • input (turret.Tensor) – Tensor which will be processed by layer.

  • max_seq_len (int) – The maximum length of the time sequence.

  • fwd_weights (turret.Weights) – Forward weights.

  • bwd_weights (turret.Weights) – Backward weights.

  • fwd_bias (turret.Weights) – Forward bias.

  • bwd_bias (turret.Weights) – Backward bias.

  • mode (turret.RNNInputMode) – RNN input mode.

  • hidden_state (turret.Tensor) – Initial hidden status of RNN.

Returns

tensor(turret.Tensor) – Tensor processed by layer.
